title: 820-2936 gray screen
message:
Have a 820-2936 that had water damage in lcd area. Replaced everything affected and now screens turns on but is gray. This is a test lcd so I know that is not the issue.

What to check first?

title: 820-2936 gray screen
message:
Does it chime?
Also check for USB activity and test external video.
Try PRAM reset too...

title: 820-2936 gray screen
message: yes it chimes with usb activity and has external video

title: 820-2936 gray screen
message:
You still have liquid affected components, or traces.
Did you change LCD connector?
Check all data lines in diode mode to ground and voltage; compare with similar working board.
Be sure L9080 is OK.
